skill.name: clinical-reports
skill.description: Write comprehensive clinical reports including case reports (CARE guidelines), diagnostic reports (radiology/pathology/lab), clinical trial reports (ICH-E3, SAE, CSR), and patient documentation (SOAP, H&P, discharge summaries). Full support with templates, regulatory compliance (HIPAA, FDA, ICH-GCP), and validation tools.

skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: This skill ships local Python scripts that read user provided files and write local outputs. No network calls, credential access, or external command execution were found.

content.value_statement: Clinical reports often miss required sections or privacy checks. This skill provides templates and validation tools to improve completeness and compliance.
actual_capabilities: Generate clinical report templates for case reports, SOAP notes, H and P, and discharge summaries
Validate case reports against CARE guideline section requirements
Scan report text for HIPAA identifier patterns and age over 89 compliance
Validate Clinical Study Report structure against ICH E3 sections
Format adverse event CSV data into summary tables
Extract demographics, vital signs, and medication patterns from report text
limitations: Does not provide medical advice or clinical decisions
Does not connect to EHR systems or external databases
Does not generate images without a separate schematics skill
Checks are pattern based and can miss context specific issues

use_cases.title: Draft a case report
use_cases.description: Start from a CARE aligned template and run a checklist validation before submission.

use_cases.title: Review a CSR outline
use_cases.description: Check CSR section coverage against ICH E3 and prepare compliance notes.

use_cases.title: Standardize patient notes
use_cases.description: Generate SOAP or H and P templates for consistent clinical documentation.

prompt_templates.title: Get a template
prompt_templates.scenario: New patient note in a clinic
prompt_templates.prompt: List available templates and create a SOAP note template named new_soap.md.

prompt_templates.title: CARE section check
prompt_templates.prompt: Validate this case report for CARE sections and list missing required parts.

prompt_templates.title: HIPAA scan
prompt_templates.prompt: Scan this report text for HIPAA identifiers and summarize the risks and fixes.

prompt_templates.title: CSR compliance audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Check this CSR draft for ICH E3 sections and report the compliance rate.

output_examples.input: Check my case report for CARE compliance and HIPAA identifiers.
output: CARE compliance: 82 percent, missing Timeline and Informed Consent sections
HIPAA identifiers found: one email address and one full date
Recommendation: add missing sections and remove identifiers

best_practices: Start from the provided templates to match report structure
Run deidentification checks before sharing drafts
Document consent statements explicitly in case reports
anti_patterns: Including raw patient identifiers in drafts
Skipping required CARE or ICH E3 sections
Relying on automated checks without clinical review

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. It provides templates and local scripts that work with these platforms.

faq.question: What are the report size limits?
faq.answer: There are no fixed limits, but very large files can slow down checks.

faq.question: Can it integrate with my EHR or data warehouse?
faq.answer: No. It only reads local files and does not connect to external systems.

faq.question: How is patient data handled?
faq.answer: Processing is local to your files. There are no network calls or uploads.

faq.question: What if a script fails or reports errors?
faq.answer: Verify the input file path and format, then rerun with the correct file.

faq.question: How does it compare to manual checklists?
faq.answer: It automates section and identifier checks, but still requires human review.
